text: Customers are choosing AWS

for generative AI
for a variety of reasons.

First it really begins
with secure

and highly available
and capable infrastructure.

Security has always been
job zero at AWS

and so we've designed
our AI services

and capabilities
to offer access to highly secure

virtualization capabilities
through the AWS Nitro system.
We're really trying

to democratize access to models
through Amazon Bedrock,

and in order to differentiate,
customers need to bring

something unique,
and what they have

that's unique
is their understanding

of their business and
their customers and their data.

Amazon Bedrock is
the best way to build

generative AI applications, 
and customers are really adopting

Amazon Bedrock
at a massive rate.
It's one of the fastest

growing AWS services
over the last decade.

Customers are using Amazon
Bedrock for a wide variety

of use cases, whether that's
improving productivity,

interacting with corporate data,
building applications
to help with compliance,

building applications to help,
say, blind people interact

with audio-based applications
that are powered
by generative AI.

The range of use
cases is incredibly diverse.
